1: Yahweh, I give myself to you.\q1
2:
My God, I trust in you.\q1 Do not allow my enemies to defeat me
\q2 and shame me.
\q1 Do not allow my enemies to defeat me
\q2 and rejoice over me.
\q1
3:
Do not allow any of those who trust in you to be ashamed.\q2 Cause those who act treacherously toward others to be disgraced.



\q1
4:
Yahweh, show me the way that I should conduct my life,\q2 teach me how to act in the manner that you want me to act.
\q1
5:
Teach me to conduct my life by obeying your truth\q2 because you are my God, the one who saves me.
\q2 All during the day I trust in you.


\q1
6:
Yahweh, do not forget how you have acted mercifully to me and have faithfully loved me because of your covenant with me;\q2 that is the way that you have acted toward me from long ago.
\q1
7:
Forgive me for all the sinful things I did and the ways that I rebelled against you when I was young;\q2 I request this because you faithfully love your people and do good things for them, as you promised in your covenant.
\q1 Yahweh, do not forget me!



\q1
8:
Yahweh is good and fair,\q2 so he shows sinners how they should conduct their lives.
\q1
9:
He shows humble people what is right for them to do\q2 and teaches them what he wants them to do.


\q1
10:
He always faithfully loves us and does what he has promised\q2 for those who obey his covenant and who do what he requires.
\q1
11:
Yahweh, forgive me for all my sins, which are many,\q2 in order that I may honor you.



\q1
12:
To all those who have an awesome respect for you,\q2 you show them the right way to conduct their lives.
\q1
13:
They will always be prosperous,\q2 and their descendants will continue to live in this land.


\q1
14:
Yahweh is a friend of those who have an awesome respect for him,\q2 and he teaches them the covenant that he made with them.
\q1
15:
I always request Yahweh to help me,\q2 and he rescues me from danger.
\q1
16:
Yahweh, pay attention to me and be merciful to me because I am alone,\q2 and I am greatly distressed because I am suffering.


\q1
17:
I have many troubles that make me afraid;\q2 rescue me from them.
\q1
18:
Note that I am distressed and troubled,\q2 and forgive me for all my sins.
\q1
19:
Note that I have many enemies;\q2 you see that they hate me very much.


\q1
20:
Protect me and rescue me from them;\q2 do not allow them to defeat me
\q2 with the result that I would be ashamed;
\q1 I have gone to you to get refuge.
\q1
21:
Protect me because I do what is good and honest\q2 and because I trust in you.



\q1
22: God, rescue us Israelite people from all of our troubles!
